full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 467 Filed 11/15/21 Page 144 of 158144 LBAAMAX5ps Rocchio - Cross 1 Q. And do you recall that initially the authors considered 322 articles and selected 33 out of those 332? 2 A. I don't recall that as we sit here today, specifically, no. I'm sorry. 3 Q. And if we can go to page 3 of Government Exhibit 6. Page 3 starts a table that has a summary of the various articles that were reviewed. Is that correct? 4 A. That's my understanding, yes. 5 Q. So let's look at some of the -- this study considered males and females, correct? 6 A. Yes. 7 Q. And you know that males tend to not report as frequently as females for a variety of psychological issues, correct? 8 A. Correct. 9 Either not report or delay further. 10 Q. Right. 11 A. So that would be one of the predictors or facilitators of delayed disclosure. 12 Q. And you're aware -- are you aware that this case does not involve any allegation of delayed reporting by males? 13 MS. POMERANTZ: Objection. 14 THE COURT: What's the grounds? 15 MS. POMERANTZ: Your Honor, she doesn't know about this case, the specific details. 16 MR. PAGLIUCA: Well, I think that's my point, your 17 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00007323

1 Q. And do you recall that initially the authors considered 322 articles and selected 33 out of those 332? 2 A. I don't recall that as we sit here today, specifically, no. I'm sorry. 3 Q. And if we can go to page 3 of Government Exhibit 6. Page 3 starts a table that has a summary of the various articles that were reviewed. Is that correct? 4 A. That's my understanding, yes. 5 Q. So let's look at some of the -- this study considered males and females, correct? 6 A. Yes. 7 Q. And you know that males tend to not report as frequently as females for a variety of psychological issues, correct? 8 A. Correct. 9 Either not report or delay further. 10 Q. Right. 11 A. So that would be one of the predictors or facilitators of delayed disclosure. 12 Q. And you're aware -- are you aware that this case does not involve any allegation of delayed reporting by males? 13 MS. POMERANTZ: Objection. 14 THE COURT: What's the grounds? 15 MS.
